name: Elves
text: +1 Villagers +1 Treasure, Reveal the top card of your deck. | Whens omething causes you to reveal this (using the word "reveal"), +1 Card. If it's your turn, +1 Treasure, and +1 Buy.

name: Santa's Workshop
text: +1 Villagers, You may trash this. If you do, gain a card costing equal to the number of Villagers on your mat.

name: Silent Night
text: Until the end of your next turn, if you would trash a card, you may discard it instead.

name: Carolers
text: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an... ...Action, play it. ...Treasure, +2 Treasure. ...Victory, discard it. ...Curse, trash it.

name: Fruitcake
text: When you trash this, each other player gains a Fruitcake onto their deck.

name: Grinch
text: Trash a Grinch from the Supply. If you do, each other player trashes a card costing 3 or more from their hand, or reveals a hand with no cards costing 3 or more. Otherwise, trash this and each player gains a Gift.

name: Milk and Cookies
text: Gain a Treasure costing up to 6. Trash this.

name: Reindeer
text: +1 Card +1 Action, Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Night card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it back.

name: Santa's Village
text: +1 Card +2 Villagers

name: Krampus
text: Each opponent trashes an Attack from their hand and gains a Curse, or reveals a hand with no Attacks and gains a Copper onto their deck.

name: Nutcracker
text: Each player reveals the top card of their deck. If you revealed the card with the highest cost, trash all of the other cards. You may trash or discard your revealed card. Otherwise put it back.

name: Snowman
text: Set aside any number of cards from your hand face down (under this). While any remain, now and at the start of each of your turns, trash or discard one of them. +1 Treasure per 1 it costs.

name: Scrooge
text: Until your next turn, when each other player plays a Treasure, they get +1 Treasure instead of following its instructions. Gain a Ghost of Christmas Past onto your deck.

name: Ghost of Christmas Past
text: Put a Treasure from your discard pile onto your deck. Return this to its pile, and gain a Ghost of Christmas Present onto your deck. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Ghost of Christmas Present
text: Put a Treasure from play onto your deck. Return this to its pile, and gain a Ghost of Christmas Future onto your deck. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Ghost of Christmas Future
text: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Attack card. Gain a card costing less than or equal to the total cost of the revealed cards. Trash any revealed Attack cards and discard the others. Return this to its pile. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Mistletoe
text: Reveal the top card of your deck. You may reveal a card from your hand that shares a type with it. If you do, +3 Treasure. Otherwise, +1 Treasure.

name: Snow Globe
text: Shuffle your hand and your discard pile into your deck, then +4 Cards.

name: Sleigh Bells
text: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a non-Treasure card. Discard those cards and +1 for each Treasure revealed this way.

name: Stockings
text: Until your next turn, whenever a player buys a card, set a Silver from the Supply aside (under this). At the start of your next turn, gain all Silvers under this to your hand and +1 Buy.

name: Unwrap
text: Reveal the top card of your deck. You may trash it. If you do, gain a card costing up to 2 more than it onto your deck. Otherwise, put it back.

name: Sugar Plum Fairy
text: If it's your Night phase, gain a Silver onto your deck. Otherwise, gain a Gold onto your deck.

name: Jolly Old Elf
text: Gain a Gift from its pile onto your deck. Until your next turn, whenever an opponent buys or play an Attack card, they gain a Lump of Coal onto their deck.

name: White Elephant
text: Each player secretly chooses a card from the Supply and sets it aside face down (under this). While any remain, at the start of each player's turn, they reveal a random card from this pile and gain it to their hand.

name: Wishlist
text: +1 Action +1 Buy, Name two cards. Reveal the top two cards of your deck and put any copies of the named cards into your hand.

name: Gift
text: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Play any Treasures. Put the rest back in any order. Return this to its pile. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Lump of Coal
text: (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Chimney
text: When you gain this, each other player gains a Lump of Coal onto their deck.

name: Christmas Tree
text: Set aside all Coppers, Silvers, and Gols in play (under this). (This stays in play.) Worth 1 VP for every 1 Treasure under this at the end of the game (otherwise worth 0 VP).
